data.text: @W1nston984 and someone in #FreedomConvoy  wondered where I got my information.  Ignorance is bliss, but it also can hurt.

@W1nston984 @NullumOffer @melononline_ (4of4) Because Aruba is deploying boosters right now. Look at the prior post and see Aruba prior to boosting. Death. And when the boosters wane in a month or so, more death. We have seen this repeatedly, all over the world.
https://t.co/f4NY5DUIyA

@W1nston984 @NullumOffer @melononline_ (3of4) Vaccination %

Aruba 76%
Belize 54%
Armenia 31%
Angola 17%
Benin 17%
Chad .9 %

You would think that Chad would be decimated by COVID, followed by Benin and Angola, etc. But it is almost exactly the opposite. But why is Aruba lower than Belize and Armenia? https://t.co/zDzQKmK2xK

@W1nston984 @NullumOffer @melononline_ (2of4) I am saying that the data do not support that the vaccines are so key to ending COVID, or even to protecting from death, that we must force them on people or take from them the means by which they feed their children if they do not comply. Look at these vax percentages:

@W1nston984 @NullumOffer @melononline_ (1of4) It's the vaccine cult. It's brutal. She thinks that I claim the vaccines cause deaths. I certainly believe this based on data, and I think over the long term this will become undeniable. But it is not my claim here.
https://t.co/jUNlv21srJ
@benigsen @NullumOffer @melononline_ The cognitive fallacies are truly astonishing.  No amount of data will get them to even consider reconsidering their positions.

@NullumOffer @melononline_ @W1nston984 Had you intellectual integrity. The data would have compelled you to behave differently. But you can't behave differently. Your religion, Vaccinanity, will not permit it. Now will do what all Vaccinanians do when their religion is challenged. Here comes "The block."

@NullumOffer @melononline_ @W1nston984 You know, I haven't even advanced my position here. I have only shown you the data, the stunning data. And yet the only thing you have done here is dismissed the reporting, this, with no evidence supporting the dismissal. You have done this because you just neeeeed it to be so.

@NullumOffer @benigsen @melononline_ Curious: so covid was the cause of death when someone died in a car crash while positive for covid….But death shortly after the vaccine ISN’T reliably due to the vax… the ability to swallow the latest nonsense from the party is astonishing.
